dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Oh, it's you again! Have you heard? All sorts of merchants and craftsmen from across the realm have come to Featherfall!

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: We were just going to head over there to see for ourselves. You should come with us─it'll be so exciting!

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Hmph. This isn't supposed to be exciting, Peyraquile. These outsiders are the competition, and we're going to scout them out. Let's get going now!

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Look at those stones! How do they make them sparkle like that!? ...Ah, I mean...that's easy.

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: What do you suppose that is? And that...and that, too!

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: This is amazing! I've never seen anything like...any of these things before!

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: If we could fashion some eye-catching wares of our own, I do believe we could earn good coin here.

dialogue.name: HWDBOY
dialogue.text: (-???-)Whatever shall we do, Sister?

dialogue.name: HWDGIRL
dialogue.text: Indeed...

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Hey, what's the matter? You're looking awfully glum.

dialogue.name: HWDGIRL03959
dialogue.text: Oh, hello there. My brother and I heard that traders from around the world had set up shop here in the Firmament, so we've come to peruse their wares.

dialogue.name: HWDBOY03959
dialogue.text: And what's more, Mother was kind enough to give us some extra gil to buy ourselves a special treat!

dialogue.name: HWDGIRL03959
dialogue.text: There's one most luscious-looking exotic fruit that caught our eye, but sadly, it's just a bit too expensive. Still, we don't want to settle for anything less...

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Is that all? If you need money, why don't you just earn it?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: That's what we do. We make all sorts of things and sell them for good coin!

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: Well, aren't you a spirited one. If you're hurtin' for gil, maybe we could make ourselves a deal?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: ...What kind of deal?

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: Bwahaha! A tough negotiator, I see! Here's the story: I'm a hunter from the Dravanian forelands─an' a pretty good one, if I do say so myself.

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: I was on my way back to the wilds after droppin' off my chocobo, an' that's when it hit me─it's bleedin' cold out there, an' I could use myself a new overcoat.

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: I'm not lookin' for anythin' fancy, mind you. If it keeps me warm and toasty in the blisterin' snow an' wind, that's plenty fine for me. Reckon any of you young ones'd be able to help a hunter out?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Hah! Could we ever! You just watch─we'll whip you up the finest coat you've ever seen before you can bat an eyelash!

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: Good to hear it! I'll be lingerin' around the markets for a while still, so you can just bring it on back to me whenever it's ready.

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Well, looks like we have a job to do. It's off to Rolanberry Field for me to procure the needed tools─perhaps you'd like to come along?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Julchiezain and Peyraquile─I can count on the two of you to get some cloth from old Achard, yes?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: When we have all that we need, let's meet back here. All right, everyone─let's get to work!

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: Would've reckoned someone like you'd have more important matters on your plate than tendin' to children─though I s'pose I'm not one to talk. Anyroad, I imagine you'll be going along to see that they don't get themselves into trouble.

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: That lass's a determined one, ain't she? I daresay she reminds me of a certain someone...

dialogue.name: ACHARD
dialogue.text: Well, if it ain't the Rolanberry children! What can old Achard do you for today?

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Er, we need a length of... Drat, what was it again?

dialogue.name: HWDGIRL03959
dialogue.text: Th-This gentleman certainly is...friendly...

dialogue.name: HWDBOY03959
dialogue.text: Oh, how I would love to take part in a good snowball fight. Sister simply refuses to even entertain the notion. She says she can't abide getting her hands cold.

dialogue.name: RASEQUIN
dialogue.text: Ah, you're back! I trust there's something you need from me?

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Oh, you came too! Good! There's something I wanted to ask you.

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: What sort of fabric do you think is best for making an overcoat? Peyraquile and I, we really don't know anything about weaving, you see. It's Lycelle who fancies herself a seamstress.

dialogue.name: ACHARD
dialogue.text: Well, if it ain't the hero of Ishgard! I'm glad to see you as well. I've been tryin' to get these lads to tell me just what sort of fabric they need, but they can't seem to give me a straight answer! So, what'll it be?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: A thick pelt to ward off the cold.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: A square of linen, simple yet sturdy.

dialogue.name: ACHARD
dialogue.text: Hah, is that all? Well, why didn't you say so!? Old Achard has just the thing for you!

dialogue.name: ACHARD
dialogue.text: An' here you go! I reckon this'll serve you well enough.

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Why, it most certainly will! Many thanks, my good man!

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Um, Rasequin? There's a favor I would ask of you.

dialogue.name: RASEQUIN
dialogue.text: Well, if it isn't Lycelle! What can I do for you and your friends today?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: A hunter we met at the markets has hired us to make him an overcoat. Do you have a needle and thread we could borrow?

dialogue.name: RASEQUIN
dialogue.text: I do, indeed, but I can't just let you have it. Why, if you so much as pricked your finger with my tools, I'd never hear the end of it.

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: No need to fear! Forename is here to watch over me and see that I'm perfectly safe. Isn't that right, Forename?

dialogue.name: RASEQUIN
dialogue.text: ...I see. Well, if the savior of Ishgard is willing to vouch for you, who am I to oppose? Here you go. Just be careful with them, yes?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Thanks, Rasequin! You're the best!

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: The children all came runnin' back like someone'd set their pants on fire. Just between you and me, I ain't in that much of a hurry.

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Honestly, I was hoping for more of a challenge. Why, I could have procured that square of fabric in my sleep!

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: I've never made something for a real hunter before! I hope he likes it...

dialogue.name: HWDGIRL03959
dialogue.text: How marvelous it must be to be able to fashion clothing with one's own hands. I can scarcely wait to learn myself!

dialogue.name: HWDBOY03959
dialogue.text: Is there aught I might do to assist?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Well, I do believe we have everything we need. Shall we get started, then?

dialogue.name: HWDGIRL03959
dialogue.text: Say...what do I do with this part here?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Ah! Just hold that in place, fold it over─yes, just like that─and now stitch right there. Exactly! You're a natural!

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Why, it's a perfect fit! Our best work yet, if I do say so myself. And how does it feel, good sir?

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: It's sturdy, warm, an' even a fair bit more stylish than I'd been expectin'. You've got yourself one satisfied customer, lass.

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: I reckon this should cover it. Go an' buy yourself somethin' nice, now.

dialogue.name: HWDGIRL03959
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you!

dialogue.name: HWDGIRL03959
dialogue.text: And thank you. We couldn't have done this without you. Here, this is your share.

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: What? But this is just about all of it...

dialogue.name: HWDGIRL03959
dialogue.text: Well, seeing as you did just about all the work, it seems only fair. Together with what our mother gave us, we have enough here to buy our fruit.

dialogue.name: HWDGIRL03959
dialogue.text: Speaking of Mother, we'd best head back before she starts worrying what's become of us. Might we come back to play again?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: But of course! You're welcome to visit any time.

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: How nice it must be to have a mother to return to...

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: Don't look so down, lass. Bein' able to help out a couple of nobles ain't nothin' to sneeze at─an' I reckon the friendship you've made today will serve you well.

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: Speakin' of new friends, I've got just the thing to cheer you up. How'd you like to take a baby chocobo off my hands?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: ...A baby chocobo?

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: Aye. Hatched from the egg of one of my best birds, but I've been having the damndest time tryin' to train it. Doesn't seem suited for the huntin' life. An' so I thought it could use a new family─how'd you like to be its new mother?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Me, its...mother? Why, yes...I'd like that very much!

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: And with the coin we've earned, we can buy it food and everything! Heh, the little ones are going to be over the moon when they hear who's coming to live with us!

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Not just the little ones─Rasequin too! He adores chocobos! Come on, let's go and tell him right now!

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: You know, Forename... Just lookin' at you and those children, it calls to mind that time I came upon you and Ysayle in Tailfeather. Gods, how time flies...

dialogue.name: MARCECHAMP
dialogue.text: But speakin' of time flyin', I'd best be movin' on. I've got a chocobo to deliver─and then it's back to the road for me. Till next we meet, lasslad.
